Subroutine run_cce

633 : 
634 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
635 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
636 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
637 : 
638 :       subroutine run_cce ()
639 :       use sce_mod
640 :       implicit none
641 : 
642 :       INTEGER :: m_, first
643 :       CHARACTER(300) :: writeformat
644 : 
645 : !     * PARTITION THE sopt POINTS INTO ncomp2 COMPLEXES
646 : !     * EXECUTE CCE ALGORITHM
647 : 
648 :       if (ncomp2 .gt. 1) then
649 :         if (nloop .gt. 0) then
650 :           if (ncomp2 .gt. ncompmin) then
651 :             ncomp2 = ncomp2 - 1                   ! REDUCE NUMBER OF COMPLEXES AS nloop INCREASES
652 :           else
653 :             if (worstbest .le. ofvec(1+(ncomp2-1)*mopt)) then
654 :               writeformat = '("No gene pool mixing ... '
655 :               writeformat(27:64) = 'reducing number of complexes by one.")'
656 :               write(*,writeformat)
657 :               write(kfile_progress,writeformat)
658 :               ncomp2 = ncomp2 - 1
659 :             endif
660 :           endif
661 :         endif
662 :       endif
663 : 
664 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
665 : ! THIS BLOCK CAN BE PARALLELISED!
666 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
667 : 
668 :       do m_ = 1, ncomp2
669 :         first = 1 + (m_ - 1) * mopt
670 :         writeformat = '("Start of loop",i4,", complex",i2,'
671 :         writeformat(36:55) = '": best OF =",e12.6)'
672 :         write(*,writeformat) nloop + 1, m_, ofvec(first)
673 :         write(kfile_progress,writeformat) nloop + 1, m_ ,ofvec(first)
674 :         if (m_ .eq. 1) then
675 :           bestincomp = -9999.d0                   ! SET LESS THAN bestobj
676 :         else
677 :           bestincomp = ofvec(first)
678 :         endif
679 :         call cce(ofvec(first:m_*mopt), shufflevar(:,first:m_*mopt))
680 :         writeformat(3:7) = '  End'
681 :         write(*,writeformat) nloop + 1, m_, ofvec(first)
682 :         write(kfile_progress,writeformat) nloop + 1, m_, ofvec(first)
683 :       enddo
684 :       worstbest = ofvec(first)
685 : 
686 : !%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
687 : ! WRITE shufflevar AND ofvec OF LAST LOOP TO FILE
688 : 
689 :       call writeloop
690 :       close(kfile_sceout)
691 :       close(kfile_bestpars)
692 :       close(kfile_progress)
693 : 
694 :       return
695 :       end subroutine run_cce
